column5: Wow! I'm going to have to return to this to really savour the pics. Looks like you've had another terrific year. Thanks for sharing your season with us and a huge congrats to Kelli on her win.
Nice eye candy to wake up to. I have caught some big Crappie and Perch but those are monsters. Thanks for the pictures and the report.   Art
Now that was a heck of a good season.Thanks for sharing!!!!!!!!!!!!
WICKED Steve!  inspired, impressed and JEALOUS all at once!  Great pics and recapâ€¦.what an awesome year!!!!!  Lend me $100
Wow man!!!! Thanks for that!!!! Amazing pics of amazing fish;)
Awesome season Steve - some really amazing fish!!!  Pete
WOZERS. Those are some real sweet fish dude.
Awesome as always Sir Catch A Lot!!
Awesome season, got to get a recap together I think soon!  Thanks for sharing  MTBF
Thanks everyone.  I enjoyed this season a lot and cant wait for next year!
Awesome stuff Steve ... thats a great recap of some stellar outings ...
those are all really nice fish how big was that largie in that pic that you were on your knees?

those are all really nice fish how big was that largie in that pic that you were on your knees? If it's the one with the red shirt, I didnt get a weight on her but it was one of my better largies for sure.  I'd say 6.5 - 7lbs but thats just a guess
